channel.title: Expression Pedal to Midi CC / Range, Values Min Max
channel.description:
Hi All!
Im very new to the Axoloti and love it so far. I could figure out most things by learning with the demos on right click. But I could not figure out how to use the Multiply Math thing.
My Problem is that i want the Expression pedal to have more effect on the midi cc output value. So multiply the incoming signal so to say. Also I wanted to have a Max and a Min Value.
Can anybody help me out?
Regarding, Mario

item.title: Expression Pedal to Midi CC / Range, Values Min Max
item.dc:creator: @mariomalidus Mario Malidus
item.description:
@mariomalidus wrote:

I was able to solve it with the factory demos

Read full topic
item.source: Expression Pedal to Midi CC / Range, Values Min Max
